attributes.action: Jail drug dealers for more than 1,2,3,4,or 5 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need stricter sentences for drug dealers as not only do they break the law in committing a crime dealing drugs but also defrauding the government of tax.  I pay tax.  I pay for these dealers to sit at home, deal their drugs and get a slap on the wrist and more money in their pockets.  Enough is most certainly enough.  Make an example.  Make it a life sentence (being the rest of their natural life) or even 10 years, where they wont be allowed benefits when they are free - EVER!!!  Who else likes watching their wages go to dole dossing drug dealers when they could have more money to spend on themselves.  I most certainly do no.  They deal and get caught.  They dont care about spending a couple of years locked up because they pick up their drug dealing business when they get out.  They benefit and we lose.

rejection.details: The sentencing of convicted criminals is a matter for the Judges in each case to decide.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
